name: ASTEROID2 TOGETHER - An Asteroids Coop Clone
name_original: ASTEROID2 TOGETHER - An Asteroids Coop Clone
description:
ASTEROID2 TOGETHER: An Asteroids Coop Fan Game

Remember the classic 1979 Atari's Asteroids? Always wanted to play it with a friend in coop? Do you ever thought that it will be fun to have a versus mode? 

ASTEROID2 TOGETHER is a fan game made by Madwolf Studios as an homage to the 40th anniversary of Asteroids. The base game is a clone of the original with some minor differences, like some adjustments to the overall pace of the game and some changes in sound design. Where it actually makes a difference is that the game allows for actual 2 player mode (cooperative, not just by turns). Then, the game converts into a chaotic experience where shots and ships will fly all over the screen! Then, you can try the PVP mode, a little game mode where you'll fight 1v1 with your buddy to see who's a better captain!

If the original game was fun, you will love this version!

Key Features

  • The same experience as the original game if you want it!
  • A cooperative mode! Play together!
  • An undercooked PvP mode! Just for laughs!
  • 60 FPS and HD gameplay (how NOVEL!)
  • Completely monochromatic, just like 1979. Full RETRO!
  • Will be updated from time to time! (I promise!)
  • Free! Don't want that C&D!
